hero_description: Hello, I am a Web Developer and this is my personal Portfolio that shows my works and experiences.
contact_form_description: Get in-touch with me!, I am happy to hear from you.
contact_form_error_message_1: Your Name must be at least 2 characters.
contact_form_error_message_2: Your Name must not be higher than 30 characters.
contact_form_error_message_3: Full name can only contain letters, spaces, and hyphens.
contact_form_error_message_6: Your Message must be at least 10 characters.
contact_form_error_message_7: Your Message must not be higher than 500 characters.
contact_form_error_message_8: Message can only contain letters, spaces, numbers, and hyphens.
contact_form_toast_success_description: I will respond as soon as possible.
